It must be. Pal isn't released until the 25th of June.
I don't understand the size of the file. I have heard this game is only 1GB to install to HDD.
dont you read the info? "PLAYABLE @ USA & PAL", meaning it will work for PAL and NTSC-U consoles, but im not sure if it will work on NTSC-J consoles.
once you click on it to download it comes up and tells you region free.
